sentence.Network_en: Four nozzles , canted outboard, split the exhaust of the solid rocket motor into four equal tails.

sentence.Network_en: Some cars came through, towing small boats and big outboard motors on trailers.

sentence.Network_en: Since imported outboard engine is applied, This yacht has stable performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 本艇使用进口舷外机作为推进系统, 性能稳定.
